## NotificationsOptions interface

Options for notifications component

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NotificationsOptions<TMessageCssClasses, TOptions extends NotificationMessageOptions<TMessageCssClasses>> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cssClasses](./notifications.notificationsoptions.cssclasses.md) | <code>NotificationsOptionsCss</code> | Css classes used within notifications component |
|  [getNotificationMessageComponent](./notifications.notificationsoptions.getnotificationmessagecomponent.md) | <code>(type: NotificationType) =&gt; Type&lt;NotificationMessage&lt;TMessageCssClasses, TOptions&gt;&gt;</code> | Gets type that represents component used for displaying notification message |
|  [maxLength](./notifications.notificationsoptions.maxlength.md) | <code>number</code> | Maximal allowed length of notification message |
|  [messageOptions](./notifications.notificationsoptions.messageoptions.md) | <code>TOptions</code> | Options passed to each message |
|  [timeout](./notifications.notificationsoptions.timeout.md) | <code>number</code> | Timeout in ms, after which will be notification closed, if set to 0, message will stay |
